T02D1662:19b-1: sarba kalpa sa mutstsha ya n'a ma sarba buddha sa
T02D1662:19b-2: ma yo ga d'a ki ni dz'a la sambha ra
T02D1662:19b-5: rtog pa thams cad 'dus pa zhes bya ba sangs
T02D1662:19b-6: rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro
T02D1662:19b-7: ma sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog gi rgyud phyi ma'i
T02D1662:19b-8: phyi ma rnams par bshad pa //
T02D1662:19b-9: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1662:19b-10: de ltar rnam par bshad pa chen pos rtog pa bcu'i bdag nyid //
T02D1662:19b-11: sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha'
T02D1662:19b-12: 'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog gi de kho
T02D1662:19b-13: na'i rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i
T02D1662:19b-14: rgyud phyi ma'i yang phyi ma yis //
T02D1662:19b-15: rtsa ba'i rgyud la sogs pa la brjod pa'i rtog pa'i don dang //
T02D1662:19b-16: rgyud phyi ma'i dang po'i sa chog dang //
T02D1662:19b-17: gdod ma dang tha ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02D1662:19b-21: shin tu bzang ba nyid dang /
T02D1662:19b-22: rdo rje snying po'i gtso bo nyid dang /
T02D1662:19b-27: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po nyid dang /
T02D1662:19b-29: bdud dang bdud las rgyal pa dang /
T02D1662:19b-32: rdo rje gtum po mthar byed dang /
T02D1662:19b-34: dang po'i rigs bskyed pa dang /
T02D1662:19b-35: 'dod pa'i thar pa dang rnam pa gsum thams cad nyid dang /
T02D1662:19b-36: dang po'i snying po 'byung ba dang /
T02D1662:20a-4: don yod pa'i dam tshig dang /
T02D1662:20a-5: dkyil 'khor gyi don shes pa dang /
T02D1662:20a-6: dkyil 'khor du bcug pa'i rnam par smin pa dang /
T02D1662:20a-7: dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa dang /
T02D1662:20a-9: gsang ba chen po lnga dang /
T02D1662:20a-10: de bzhin nyid chen po dang /
T02D1662:20a-13: dbang thams cad bskur ba dang /
T02D1662:20a-14: phyag rgya chen po'i tshig kyi de nyid dang /
T02D1662:20a-17: byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa dang sgrub pa'o //
T02D1662:20a-18: de rnams kyi tshig dang don gyi 'khrul pa bsal bar bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan dang /
T02D1662:20a-19: bsam gtan gyi bdag nyid kyi don du rig pa'i
T02D1662:20a-20: las thams cad bsal bar bya ba'i dngos grub thams
T02D1662:20a-21: cad 'grub par byed pa rnams gsungs pa /
T02D1662:20a-22: sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal te /
T02D1662:20a-23: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1662:20a-24: de la dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i
T02D1662:20a-25: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1662:20a-26: sems dang sems las byung ba dang /
T02D1662:20a-27: de dang rgyu mthun pa rnams sprul pa dang 'dra ba /
T02D1662:20a-28: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ni /
T02D1662:20a-29: sangs rgyas thams cad ces pa'o//
T02D1662:20a-32: zhes pa'i sgra ni nges pa'i don te /
T02D1662:20a-33: sangs rgyas de dag kho na la phyag 'tshal ba yin gyi /
T02D1662:20a-34: gzhan ni ma yin zhes pa'i tha tshig gi //
T02D1662:20a-35: ma lus lus pa med ces pa la sogs pa ni /
T02D1662:20a-36: de la ma lus zhes pa ni chod kyi dbyings dang /
T02D1662:20a-37: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la'o //
T02D1662:20a-38: lus pa med ces pa ni thams cad ma lus pa'o //
T02D1662:20a-40: thabs dang shes rab kyi dngos po dpal rdo rje
T02D1662:20a-41: sems dpa' la sogs pa sgrub par byed pa'i stobs
T02D1662:20a-43: rnam rtog med ba'i sems la ni //
T02D1662:20a-45: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pa mi rtog pa'i sems rtse gcig pa'o //
T02D1662:20a-46: yang de kho na gsungs pa de kho na nyid nges par zhes pa ste /
T02D1662:20a-47: rtog pa'i don shes pa la sogs pa pa ngo bo ni de kho na nyid ces pa'o //
T02D1662:20b-0: de'i nges pa la bzung ba'i ngo bo nyid gnas pa ni nges par @20b gnas zhes pa'o //
T02D1662:20b-1: don ni 'di ltar gsung par 'gyur te /
T02D1662:20b-2: rang bzhin dag pa'i chos thams cad dpyad pa la
T02D1662:20b-3: gnas pa'i sems 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad la
T02D1662:20b-5: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i thams dang
T02D1662:20b-6: shes rab kyi rang bzhin bskyed pa'i chos kyi yi
T02D1662:20b-7: ges ni / yang nas yang dug gtan la phab
T02D1662:20b-8: ste bskyed nas sgrub pa pos mngon du byed pa
T02D1662:20b-9: ni rtog pa'i don shes pa rnams kyi gzhir gyur
T02D1662:20b-10: ges ni / pa'o // de bas de 'dra ba la ni /
T02D1662:20b-11: de kho na nyid nges par gnas zhes so //
T02D1662:20b-12: des ni chos kyi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pa
T02D1662:20b-13: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gsal
T02D1662:20b-14: bar byed pa'i rgyu 'di yin no //
T02D1662:20b-15: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs su gsungs pa'i chos
T02D1662:20b-16: kyi phyag rgya yis ni rtog pa thams cad 'dus
T02D1662:20b-17: pa 'jug pa la bshad par byed do //
T02D1662:20b-18: da ni chos kyi phyag rgyas gang grub par byed pa de ston pa ni /
T02D1662:20b-19: sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos //
T02D1662:20b-20: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1662:20b-21: de dag kyang bshad zin to //
T02D1662:20b-22: de ltar gzung ba'i tshig gis chos kyi phyag rgya la de kho na nyid gnas par gsungs nas /
T02D1662:20b-23: de gnas pa'i man ngag gi tshig gis re zhig gsungs pa /
T02D1662:20b-24: 'dod chags chen po bde che la //
T02D1662:20b-26: thams cad mi gsung 'os ma lags //
T02D1662:20b-27: zhes ji snyed pa'i bar du'o //
T02D1662:20b-28: da ni man ngag gi tshig rnams ston pas gsungs pa /
T02D1662:20b-29: de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D1662:20b-30: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1662:20b-31: de la de nas zhes pa ni zhus pa'i de ma thag pa'i tshig de kho na'o //
T02D1662:20b-32: skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi
T02D1662:20b-33: khams la rang gi bka' 'byor par byed pas ston
T02D1662:20b-34: pa zhes pa'o // rdo rje 'dzin zhes pa ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
T02D1662:20b-35: bka' stsal pa zhes pa dang 'brel to //
T02D1662:20b-36: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1662:20b-37: gyi rang bzhin rtog pa la ni rtog pa kun
T02D1662:20b-38: gyi ces pa'o // de dag gi gtso bo chen
T02D1662:20b-39: po zhes pa ni nam mkha'i khams thams cad la
T02D1662:20b-40: rtag tu gnas pa'i sku dang /
T02D1662:20b-42: thugs rdo rje bcom ldan 'das bskyed pa'i rkyen to //
T02D1662:20b-43: the tshom dag gis zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla ba'o //
T02D1662:20b-44: rnam par mi rtog chos dag la //
T02D1662:21a-0: zhes pa ni ji ltar gsungs pa'i dpal rdo rje sems @21a * //
T02D1662:21a-1: dpa' la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gzung 'dzin rnam par
T02D1662:21a-2: rtog pa med pa la zhes pa'i tha tshig go
T02D1662:21a-3: // sems can don du yongs su rtog / ces
T02D1662:21a-4: pa ni 'dul ba'i sems can de dag gi don
T02D1662:21a-5: du dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i mngon
T02D1662:21a-6: par 'dod pa'i don grub pa ni sems can don
T02D1662:21a-7: du yongs su rtog / ces pa'o //
T02D1662:21a-8: de'i don du rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i
T02D1662:21a-9: dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i de kho na nyid 'di
T02D1662:21a-10: sgra'i don du shes pa rjes su 'gro ba'i shes
T02D1662:21a-11: rab kyis phyogs bcur rnam par gzhag pa ni yongs
T02D1662:21a-13: de phyir rtog par yang dag bshad //
T02D1662:21a-14: ces pa ni 'dul ba'i sems can gyi don gyi
T02D1662:21a-15: rgyud yin pa'i phyir dpal rdo rje sems dpa' kho
T02D1662:21a-17: rtog pa yongs su dag phyir ro //
T02D1662:21a-18: zhes pa ni 'dul ba'i sems can gyi khams gyi
T02D1662:21a-19: gzung 'dzin gyi rnam par rtog pa spang pa'i don
T02D1662:21a-20: du zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D1662:21a-21: de ltar rtog pa'i don shes pas dngos grub gsungs nas //
T02D1662:21a-22: rgyud phyi ma'i don shes pa med na /
T02D1662:21a-24: de bsal ba'i don du rgyud phyi ma'i don shes par gsungs pa /
T02D1662:21a-25: 'di la ji ltar rgyud phyi ma yin zhe na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1662:21a-26: rgyud ni rab tu 'brel par bshad //
T02D1662:21a-27: ces pa ni rigs 'di lha thams cad kyi thun
T02D1662:21a-28: mong gi dkyil 'khor de kho na nyid la sogs
T02D1662:21a-30: gsal bar byed pa'i sgra 'dus pa nye bar spyad
T02D1662:21a-31: pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud ces gsungs so
T02D1662:21a-32: // phyi ma gong du phyung ba yin //
T02D1662:21a-33: zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang
T02D1662:21a-34: rung ma byung yang rung bskal pa bzang po la
T02D1662:21a-36: da lta'i dus kyi rang bzhin nyid kyis dpal rdo
T02D1662:21a-37: rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rtag par
T02D1662:21a-38: gnas gcig cing mchog tu 'jig rten las 'das pa
T02D1662:21a-39: dam tshig chen po 'byung ba gang yin pa de
T02D1662:21a-40: ni rgyud phyi ma'i gong du byung ba'o //
T02D1662:21a-41: de kho na yang gsungs pa /
T02D1662:21a-42: de nyid gsang ba gsang chen dag / de yang rgyud ni phyi mar 'dod //
T02D1662:21a-43: ces pa ste de nyid gsang ba gsang chen ni gong du bstan pas shes par bya'o //
T02D1662:21a-44: de yang zhes pa ni don de kho na nyid gsungs pa'o //
T02D1662:21a-45: des ni 'di gsung bar 'gyur te de nyid dang //
T02D1662:21b-0: gsang chen du gang @21b dang gang ston pa de
T02D1662:21b-1: dang de ni rgyud phyi ma zhes 'dir 'dod pa'o
T02D1662:21b-3: gang dag 'jig rten gyi sbyor ba dang /
T02D1662:21b-4: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos de kho na nyid
T02D1662:21b-5: la sogs pa rnams de dag ni rtsa ba'i rgyud
T02D1662:21b-6: ces pa dang / gang dag 'jig rten las 'das
T02D1662:21b-7: pa dam tshig chen po'i de nyid rnams de dag
T02D1662:21b-8: ni rgyud phyi ma zhes 'dod do //
T02D1662:21b-9: de ltar rgyud phyi ma zhes pa bstan nas /
T02D1662:21b-10: dang po'i sa'i de nyid ces pa gsungs te /
T02D1662:21b-11: 'di la ji ltar dang po'i sa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1662:21b-12: phyogs bcu nas rdzas thams cad dngos po'i rang bzhin
T02D1662:21b-13: dngos po thams cad go 'byed pa sbyin pa'i ngo
T02D1662:21b-14: bo ni nam mkha' kun du zhes pa'o //
T02D1662:21b-15: de rab tu gnas pa gzhan gang de de ltar ro //
T02D1662:21b-19: sna tshogs rdo rje dag gis byams pa de ni /
T02D1662:21b-20: rdo rje kun gyi dngos po mchog / ces pa'o //
T02D1662:21b-21: de nyid bde ba chen po bskyed pa'i phyir bde ba chen po zhes pa'o //
T02D1662:21b-22: sems can thams cad kyi re ba kun yongs su
T02D1662:21b-23: bskang ba'i phyir de nyid dgyes pa che zhes pa'o
T02D1662:21b-24: // da lta'i dus kyi rang bzhin nyid kyis rtag par gnas pas na /
T02D1662:21b-25: dam pa'i yi ge gzhal yas khang //
T02D1662:21b-27: de ltar dang po'i sa'i de bzhin nyid kyi shes pa bstan nas /
T02D1662:21b-28: da ni rang byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1662:21b-29: cho ga brtsams pa nas dkyil 'khor bsgom pa la
T02D1662:21b-30: de kho na nyid bsam pa'am /
T02D1662:21b-31: sbyor ba la sogs pa sgom par byed 'dod pas /
T02D1662:21b-32: mi skye bar ston pa'i sgra yig dang po la yig 'bru ka kha la sogs pa rnams dang /
T02D1662:21b-33: sgra yig aa la sogs pa bco lnga ni /
T02D1662:21b-34: de bzhin nyid kyi sbyor bas btsud nas /
T02D1662:21b-35: rang gi rigs gtso bo dang po'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i gzugs bsams te /
T02D1662:21b-36: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis kyis bskor ba'i spyi bo
T02D1662:21b-37: nas ma reg par zla gam gyis brgyan par bsams
T02D1662:21b-38: te / de'i dbus su zla ba'i yi ge rnams
T02D1662:21b-39: yid kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ri mo bris
T02D1662:21b-40: nas de kho na brjod pas /
T02D1662:21b-41: bzlas pa'i don du dkyil 'khor la sogs pa bsgom
T02D1662:21b-42: par bya'o zhes pa ston pa'i don 'di la ji
T02D1662:21b-43: ltar gdod ma dang tha ma med pa'i rdo rje
T02D1662:22a-0: lan btab pa shes rab mdun du byas pa'i yi ge ka la sogs @22a * //
T02D1662:22a-1: pas gdod ma tha ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid ces pas gsungs pa'o //
T02D1662:22a-2: de la yi ge ka la sogs zhes pa ni
T02D1662:22a-3: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bri bar bya'o zhes ba
T02D1662:22a-4: dang 'brel lo // de ji ltar bri ba yin
T02D1662:22a-5: zhe na gsungs pa dha yig mtha' dang nga nya
T02D1662:22a-6: spangs nas 'jug par bya zhes pa ste /
T02D1662:22a-7: ka'i sde la yi ge nga dang /
T02D1662:22a-8: tsa'i sde la yi ge nya spangs nas rang gi
T02D1662:22a-9: snying ga'i zla ba la g-yas kyi glo nas yi
T02D1662:22a-10: ge ka la sogs pa nga'i bar gyi yi ge
T02D1662:22a-11: 'bru bcu drug gi phreng ba yid kyis bri ba
T02D1662:22a-12: dang / yang g-yon gyi glo nas yi ge da
T02D1662:22a-13: la sogs pa'i ksha'i bar yig 'bru bcu drug gi
T02D1662:22a-14: dang / phreng ba dang / de ltar phreng ba gnyis kyi bskor ba bri bar bya'o //
T02D1662:22a-15: de nas phreng ba gnyis kyi dbus su se ral
T02D1662:22a-16: kha'i skud pa bzhin du sgra yig aa la sogs
T02D1662:22a-17: pa bcu drug gi phreng ba yid kyis bri bar
T02D1662:22a-19: dbus gnas par ni aa yig phreng //
T02D1662:22a-20: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bkod do //
T02D1662:22a-22: thig le zla tshes ldan par zhes pa ni sgra
T02D1662:22a-23: yig bco lnga pa la gang thig le'i gzugs su
T02D1662:22a-24: gnas pa zla tshes kyi tshul du yongs su btab
T02D1662:22a-25: pa'o // bar zhes pa'i sgra ni nges pa'i tshig
T02D1662:22a-26: yin pas zla tshes kyi tshul kho na zhes pa'o
T02D1662:22a-27: pa'o // // tshes drag zla ba gnyis yin te ;
T02D1662:22a-28: / sgra yig bcu drug tshes drag tu gnas pa
T02D1662:22a-29: de ni yongs su gang ba'i zla ba gnyis kyi
T02D1662:22a-31: aa yig mi 'gyur bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1662:22a-32: zhes pa ni sgra yig bco lnga pa la rang
T02D1662:22a-33: bzhin gyis zla ba gnyis med pas yi ge aa
T02D1662:22a-34: mi skye ba'i myu gu bsgom ste /
T02D1662:22a-35: yi ge aa de kho na myu gu'i gzugs su
T02D1662:22a-36: phyir gyur par bsgom par bya'o zhes pa'i don to
T02D1662:22a-37: // gnas gang du rang bzhin gang ltar sgra yig
T02D1662:22a-38: myu gu de bsgom par bya zhe na gsungs pa
T02D1662:22a-39: // / dbus su rdo rje dngos por gnas //
T02D1662:22a-40: zhes pa ni rang gi snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil
T02D1662:22a-41: 'khor gyi dbus su sgra yig rnams kyi dbus su
T02D1662:22a-42: dang po rdo rje la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gnas
T02D1662:22a-44: de'i dbus rtag tu bsgom pa ni //
T02D1662:22a-45: 'dod chags chen po bde ba che //
T02D1662:22a-46: zhes pa ni dang po'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i
T02D1662:22a-47: bum pa'i nang du rtag par sbyor ba yis bsgoms
T02D1662:22a-48: nas / yang nas yang du mngon du byas pa'i
T02D1662:22b-0: yi ge h'um la @22b sogs pa'i rang bzhin snying
T02D1662:22b-1: po dang sngags dang phyag rgya dang /
T02D1662:22b-2: rig pa'i yi ge bdag nyid ji ltar gsungs pa'i
T02D1662:22b-3: dbus su sangs rgyas pa'i yi ge bris nas ji
T02D1662:22b-4: lta ba bzhin du rnal 'byor pas 'dod chags chen
T02D1662:22b-5: po bde ba ches rtag par bsgom pa yin te
T02D1662:22b-6: / 'dod chags chen po dang bde ba chen po dang gnyis kyis ston pa dang /
T02D1662:22b-7: bskyed par bya ba'i phyir yang de las byung ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1662:22b-8: 'dod chags chen po bde ba che //
T02D1662:22b-9: zhes gsungs pa ni phyag rgya dang /
T02D1662:22b-11: rig pa'i bdag nyid dpal rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa'o //
T02D1662:22b-12: de bsgom pa'i man ngag kyang gong du bshad zin pas ma bshad do //
T02D1662:22b-13: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D1662:22b-14: sangs rgyas ri mor grags pa yin //
T02D1662:22b-15: zhes pa ni a'a li k'a li mnyam par byas
T02D1662:22b-16: pa'i 'og nas phyir gyur pa de'i 'og tu ri
T02D1662:22b-17: mos yi ge thams cad btsud pa zhes pa ste
T02D1662:22b-18: / gang du gsungs pa 'di de zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1662:22b-19: gang gi don du rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i
T02D1662:22b-20: rdo rje'i dbus su bzlas pa'i yi ge btsud nas
T02D1662:22b-21: bsgom par bya ba yin zhe na /
T02D1662:22b-22: gsungs pa de las 'gro ba zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1662:22b-23: ci'i phyir na 'di las thams cad lus pa med pa'i phyogs bcu na skye ba dang /
T02D1662:22b-25: g-yo ba'i bdag nyid pa la rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D1662:22b-26: la sogs pa'i rang bzhin 'gro ba rnams yin pa
T02D1662:22b-27: de'i phyir rnal 'byor pas kyang dpal rdo rje sems
T02D1662:22b-28: dpa' la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du de dag thams
T02D1662:22b-29: cad rang gi rgyud skyed par byed 'dod pas /
T02D1662:22b-30: ji ltar gsungs pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su dpal sangs
T02D1662:22b-31: rgyas kyi ri mo zla ba'i yi ge rnams yid
T02D1662:22b-32: kyis bkod de bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1662:22b-33: rgyu ci'i phyir na dang po'i rdo rje nye bar
T02D1662:22b-34: brtag pa'i bcom ldan 'das gdod ma dang tha ma
T02D1662:22b-37: nam mkha' las byung mtshan nyid phyir //
T02D1662:22b-38: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /

T02D1662:58b-13: rgyud 'di rnam par bshad byas pas //
T02D1662:58b-14: bdag gis thob pa'i dge ba gang //
T02D1662:58b-15: byang chub sems kyi dge dga' ba //
T02D1662:58b-16: snying po bsam med rdzu 'phrul che //
T02D1662:58b-17: des ni 'jig rten ma lus pa //
T02D1662:58b-18: rgyal ba rdo rje 'dzin chen shog //
T02D1662:58b-19: dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba
T02D1662:58b-20: mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog gi rgyud
T02D1662:58b-21: ji snyed pa'i rnam par bshad pa shes rab snang
T02D1662:58b-22: bar byed pa zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1662:58b-23: rnam par bshad pa 'di'i rnam grangs kyi tshad ni
T02D1662:58b-24: tshigs su bcad pa drug stong lnga brgya bdun cu'o
T02D1662:58b-25: // sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor gyi rnam par bshad pa
T02D1662:58b-26: 'di'i mdzad mkhan ni shr'a ni lendran bzhugs pa rdo
T02D1662:58b-27: rje slob dpon kun dga' snying po'i zhes kyis mdzad
T02D1662:58b-29: / bod kyi dge bshes la phan phyir //
T02D1662:58b-30: smri ti dzny'a na k'i rti yis //
T02D1662:58b-31: t'i ka bsgyur ba'i dge 'di yis //
